segments.text: I see a boy precariously standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched way too far, and the stool looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of anxiety as I watch him grasp for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so focused, but I wonder if he understands the risk he's taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister at the base, eagerly raising her hand, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet gesture, but it’s overshadowed by the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away, even though I wish I could shield them from the inevitable trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
